name: Office Initiation (A Tuesday JS Visual Novel)
name_original: Office Initiation (A Tuesday JS Visual Novel)
description: This game was made as a test for the Tuesday JS Online Visual Novel Engine. Its not very good, in fact its really bad lmao but thats what makes it funny. ⚠️ There are dead ends in the game, if you reach one you need to restart the game (Don't worry its very short)⚠️
